text: Ke timile dekhenaum, ki allahale, je jati akasaharu ra dharatima chan, sabaila'i timro kamama laga'irakheko cha ra usale timimathi aphno pratyaksa ra paroksa anukampaharu purai di'irakheko cha? Kehi manisaharule allahako visayama bina kunai jnana, bina kunai margadarsana ra bina kunai prakasamana kitabako adharama, jhagada gardachan
